welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Kearsley, a town known for its rich history and picturesque surroundings. We hope you'll take the time to explore and discover all the beauty and culture our town has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Limited free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Warton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
